subject: Last CFP:: EECEA2015- Philippines( Feb. 12-14, 2015)
from: "The Second International Conference on Electrical, Electronics, Computer Engineering and their Applications (EECEA2015)" <donotreply@dcmrf.net>
body:
Deadline is approaching :: EECEA2015:: Philippines URL : http://sdiwc.net/conferences/eecea2015/ +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ You are invited to participate in The Second International Conference on Electrical, Electronics, Computer Engineering and their Applications (EECEA2015) that will be held in Philippines on Feb. 12-14, 2015) +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ - All the registered papers will be published in the publisher\'s Digital Library and in the proceedings of the conference. - All the submitted papers will be reviewed by a minimum of two reviewers. - The published proceedings will be submitted for POSSIBLE indexing by at least five or more of the following: DBLP, EI, INSPEC, Research Bible, Scirus, Microsoft Academic Research, ResearchGate, and Google Scholar Databases. - In addition, BEST registered papers will be published in special issue journals +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ Important dates Submission Dates: Open from now until January 12, 2015 Conference Dates: Feb. 12-14, 2015 ---------------------------------------- If you want to unsubscribe to this mail message from SDIWC, just follow this link http://dcmrf.net/Filemailer2/sdiwc-mailer/unsubscribe.php?id=65b73db1921a24fbe97786870799ab0b Deadline is approaching :: EECEA2015:: Philippines
URL : http://sdiwc.net/conferences/eecea2015/

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
You are invited to participate in The Second International Conference on Electrical, Electronics, Computer Engineering and their Applications (EECEA2015) that will be held in Philippines on Feb. 12-14, 2015)

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
- All the registered papers will be published in the publisher\'s Digital Library and in the proceedings of the conference.
- All the submitted papers will be reviewed by a minimum of two reviewers.
- The published proceedings will be submitted for POSSIBLE indexing by at least five or more of the following: DBLP, EI, INSPEC, Research Bible, Scirus, Microsoft Academic Research, ResearchGate, and Google Scholar Databases.
- In addition, BEST registered papers will be published in special issue journals

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Important dates
Submission Dates: Open from now until January 12, 2015
Conference Dates: Feb. 12-14, 2015




If you want to unsubscribe to this mail message from SDIWC, just follow this link http://dcmrf.net/Filemailer2/sdiwc-mailer/unsubscribe.php?id=65b73db1921a24fbe97786870799ab0b
